pkgmetadata.longdescription: Credit Default Swaps // Price credit default swaps using 'C' code from the International Swaps and Derivatives Association CDS Standard Model. See https://www.cdsmodel.com/cdsmodel/documentation.html for more information about the model and https://www.cdsmodel.com/cdsmodel/cds-disclaimer.html for license details for the 'C' code.
